{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://8devices.com/carambola-2 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = 8devices_Carambola_2_Development_Board |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 8devices |model = Carambola |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 2 Development Board |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/11/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/8devices_Carambola_2_Development_Board |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z9W-CM2 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128BVEG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6JB; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C4:93:00 |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Caraboot v2.3; |stockos = Linux;3.7.9;OpenWrt Barrier Breaker;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = USB Female Mini-B
|serial = yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, SLIC |addchip = USB to Serial UART Chip;FTDI;FT232R;;1; ,,, 1.2MHz, 2A, PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8058A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ''blank'' |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/01/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.8devices.com/wiki/carambola2 '''8devices''' '''''Carambola Wiki'''''] *[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2 '''8devices''' ''github'' repo for their '''OpenWrt''' build] :[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2-packages '''''carambola2-packages''''' ''github'' repo] :[https://github.com/8devices/carambola2-luci '''''carambola2-luci''''' ''github'' repo]
